document.full_text: an ariane rocket launch carrying two satellites was aborted because of a technical hitch at the scheduled moment of liftoff in french guiana on wednesday, space officials said.
document.title: ariane launch aborted because of last-minute fault
lines_and_colors: an ariane rocket launch carrying two satellites was aborted because of a technical hitch at the scheduled moment of liftoff in french guiana on wednesday, space officials said.
